title: hecarim vs vladimir - impossible lane?
body: This lane is impossible win as hecarim without jungler's help? Any advice on how to win this lane?

replies.body: you dont win that matchup m8000 ur supposed to farm as best you can and not die at all so your poor teammates dont end up getting 1 shot

{{item:3211}} first back.

21 in defense tree would be best (there's next to no way your killing him past level 2, and he shouldn't give you the chance.)

Play passive farm and roam with your TP.

{{item:3044}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3155}} {{item:3211}}  he will then do no damageâ€¦
And depends on which runes and masteries you take as well
